languages.text: "Видит Император, я заставлю тебя поплатиться за свои богохульные эксперименты".
"By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."
languages.original_text: "Видит Император, я заставлю тебя поплатиться за свои богохульные эксперименты".

traits.locale_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for all your profane experiments."
"By the Emperor, I will make you pay for all your profane experiments."
"By the Emperor, I shall make you pay for your profane experiments."
"By the Emperor, I shall make you pay for your profane experiments."
"By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."
"By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

languages.text: « Par l'Empereur, je vais vous faire payer pour vos expériences profanes ! »
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: « Par l'Empereur, je vais vous faire payer pour vos expériences profanes ! »

languages.text: “帝皇在上，我一定会让你为那些亵渎的实验付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，我一定会让你为那些亵渎的实验付出代价。”

languages.text: "Beim Imperator, ich werde Euch für Eure schändlichen Experimente bezahlen lassen."
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Imperator, ich werde Euch für Eure schändlichen Experimente bezahlen lassen."

languages.text: «Por el Emperador, te haré pagar por tus experimentos profanos».
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: «Por el Emperador, te haré pagar por tus experimentos profanos».

languages.text: 「皇帝の名に懸けて、不敬な実験の代償は払ってもらうおう」
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の名に懸けて、不敬な実験の代償は払ってもらうおう」

languages.text: "İmparator adına sana habis deneylerinin hesabını soracağım."
languages.original_text: "By the Emperor, I will make you pay for your profane experiments."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator adına sana habis deneylerinin hesabını soracağım."
